name: 果穂
text:
──お客さんたちの席もスッゴくキラキラしてました！
水色と、黄色と、紫と、ピンクと──
trans:
The audience side were also very shining!
They have a lot of colors there like light blue, yellow,
violet, pink and──

name: 果穂
text:
オレンジもいーっぱいありました！
スッゴくきれいで、スッゴくうれしくて──！
trans:
Orange!
It was so beautiful and so happy!

name: 果穂
text: あとっ、赤いのを振ってくれてる人もいたんです！
trans: And there's even someone waving a red light!

name: 真乃
text: うん、そうだね……っ
trans: Yes, that's right.

name: 真乃
text:
本当に──ファンのみなさんが、
たくさん応援してくれてるんだってわかって……
trans:
You could really see that all the fans are cheering
hard for us.

name: 果穂
text:
はいっ
もっともーっとがんばるぞーってなりました！
trans:
Yes! It makes me want to put in more and more
effort for this!

name: 果穂
text:
それからっ、ステージにみなさんがいるのも
うれしかったんです！　16人で歌って──
trans:
And also, I was really happy that we were performing
on stage together. With all sixteen of us singing──

name: 果穂
text:
──みんなでライブ、スゴかったです！
楽しいのも、盛り上がるのも、スッゴくいっぱいでした！
trans:
──The live we put was really amazing!
It was so much fun and exciting!

name: 真乃
text:
ふふっ、うんっ
私も──すっごく素敵だったなって思うんだっ
trans:
Fufu, yes. I do think that the live concert was
really wonderful.

name: 真乃
text:
……それとねっ
果穂ちゃんも、すごかったと思う
trans:
...And also, I think that you were amazing,
Kaho-chan.

name: 果穂
text: あたしですか？！
trans: Me?! Amazing?!

name: 真乃
text: うん……っ
trans: Yes, I do.

name: 真乃
text:
果穂ちゃん、本番前も全然緊張してなかったし
ステージでも堂々としてて──
trans:
You didn't seem to be nervous at all before the
actual performance. And you looked so confident
even on stage.

name: 真乃
text: すっごくかっこよかったよ
trans: You were so cool!

name: 果穂
text:
わぁ……！　えへへ……！
うれしいです……！
trans:
Ah...! Ehehe...!
That makes me so happy!

name: 果穂
text:
──でもっ、
真乃さんはもーっとスゴかったです！
trans: ──But, Mano-san, you were much mooore amazing!

name: 真乃
text: えっ？
trans: Huh?

name: 果穂
text:
夏葉さんたちが言ってました！
真乃さんがいるから、みんなが頑張れるんだって！
trans:
Natsuha-san and the others said this!
It's because you were here, that everyone is able
to give it their all!

name: 果穂
text:
真乃さんが一番真ん中にいてくれるから、
あたしたち、思いっきりできるんだって！
trans:
It's because you were in the heart of it all that we
can do it with our utmost best!

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ……
そんな……
trans:
Ah...
That's not true.

name: 果穂
text: だから、真乃さんはスゴいんです！
trans: Which is why you are amazing, Mano-san!

name: プロデューサー
text: ──俺も果穂に賛成だな
trans: ──I agree with Kaho.

name: 真乃
text: プロデューサーさんっ……
trans: Producer-san...

name: プロデューサー
text:
もちろん真乃にも賛成だけど
──真乃も果穂もよく頑張ってたし、すごかった
trans:
I think that you'd agree too when I say this: both you
and Kaho really gave it your all and that was amazing.

name: プロデューサー
text: そしてそれは、他のみんなも同じだ
trans: That goes for each and every one of you.

name: 果穂
text: えへへ、はいっ！
trans: Ehehe, yes!

name: 真乃
text: ……はいっ
trans: Yes.

name: 真乃
text:
私……
これからも、頑張ります……っ
trans:
I... I will keep on
doing my best!

name: 真乃
text: ──むんっ
trans: Mun!
